main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects (UFOs) were reported in Wichita Falls, Texas in 1952. These objects were described as disc-shaped, metallic, and capable of erratic movements at high speeds.
interesting points: The UFOs were observed on multiple occasions, with reports indicating various sightings by different observers in the area.
One report described a disc-shaped object with a dull metallic color, exhibiting straight level and erratic movements.
The objects were reported to have pulsed or flashed at intervals, and some witnesses observed them exhibiting a steady luminous light at all times.
A civilian police officer reported seeing two small bright metallic objects moving rapidly in a northerly direction at high altitude, estimated to be traveling at 1,000 miles per hour.
In one instance, an unidentified object, described as 12 feet in diameter and metallic in appearance, was observed at the center of Wichita Falls, making a humming sound.
witnesses: civilian police officers, USAF officers, individuals
